subject: RE: Eugene PD x Flock - next steps
body:
Caroline, 

 

Does Friday, January 24th at 1230 work for meeting 1?  If so, can you set a calendar invite meeting?  I have an email to finance to pick a date for Meeting 2. 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 



 

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2025 5:12 PM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Eugene PD x Flock - next steps

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Captain Burke and Detective DeWitt,

 

Thank you again for today! We are so appreciative of the opportunity to present to you, Lane Co, and Springfield, and are excited to partner with you on your real time policing tech efforts. 

 

As a follow up, I propose we have two separate meetings (in no particular order)

 

Meeting 1- review camera map deployment to determine locations and final cost. 
Crunching some numbers, with $330k to spend over 2 years, that gives us 55ish cameras, give or take depending on installation and Falcon type. I am going to have my team cross reference Springfield's camera map to see which ones are on your border. I'll send that list over by EOD tomorrow. 

 

Here is the camera map we put together earlier this year. https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f--flocksafety-com-planning-portal-deployment-tracker-public-0f92e14e8  We will better organize the deployment as we work through finalizing your location selections. Seth and I are available to meet to go over the map:

Tuesday 1/21 - 11am, 12pm, 3pm
Wed 1/22 anytime between 12-3:30

Friday 1/24 anytime after 12 

The following week we are going to Atlanta for a company meeting but could meet on Thursday or Friday. 

 

Meeting 2 - discuss procurement w/ finance, discuss legal review, and gameplan for council/community engagement 

Tuesday 1/21- anytime

Wednesday 1/22 - anytime after 12

Thursday -1/23 anytime before 1:30pm

1/24 Friday anytime

 

If you could please let me know what works best for you, I can send the calendar invites. Thank you!

 

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f--com 

Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGS3TTORQWO4TBNUXGG33NF5TGY33DNNZWCZTFOR4S6===/MFTDKYZSGFTGMODGGBSTOYZUGZQTKMRUMU3GIMLGMU3WGYLCMRTGCZRSGI2DCNJV/www-instagram-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGMYLDMVRG633LFZRW63JPMZWG6Y3LONQWMZLUPE======/MZRWCNBYGE4DSYZXGY3TIMBUG43GMZJZGJSWMYLDMFRTMZBSME2TGNBSGRRTGNRZ/www-facebook-com-flocksafety
